website_summaries.verdict: Heavy duty scissor action log tongs that help you pick up and move logs for better burning in your fireplace or outdoor fire pit.
pros: Not hard to use to pick up logs
Works well on the size logs you will generally use in a home fireplace
Made to last a long time
cons: Sometimes these come covered in a black powdery substance than can be dirty when you open the box

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Having read some of the negative reviews of this pair of tongs ( to call them tweezers seems comical), I almost shied away from ordering them. I am glad I took the chance. These are exceptionally well made. Whatever the finish on the black metal scissors portion is, it seems like it'll last a life time. These are indeed heavy duty and the reach is exceptional. They are a Godsend at our fire pit. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Norm De Plume

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I can't even tell you how many of log picker uppers we've bought. This is the only one we will ever need. It arrived when said and in perfect condition. This baby is heavy...I mean made to last. I can't ever imagine them falling apart. You have to work the first few times to open them because they are stiff BUT they will hold any log without fear of breaking. They cost a little more but were worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: AK Jane

customer_reviews.title: I have no doubt this tool will out last me.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fire tool for those of us who can't just let the fire burn. If you're like me, and always seeking a more perfect campfire, this is the tool for you. This is very sturdy and works well. I've been using it for a few years now and it's as good as the day it arrived. Better actually, now that the joints have loosened up a tiny bit. I have no doubt this tool will out last me.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jewett

customer_reviews.title: Well Made But Difficult to Use
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made piece of iron, but not particularly well designed for its intended application. If it was intended to grip large test tubes or beakers, I would give it 5 stars. However, the curved grippers at the ends tend to catch under logs, making it difficult to get out from under the wood when it is time to withdraw the Tweezers. I flattened the curves into a slightly angled configuration with a mallet, which has improved performance dramatically. So, if you buy these things, order a mallet as well if you do not have one...
customer_reviews.author: hansaskatoon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fire Tongs.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. No residue on mine when opened and no problems with correct function. These work much better for my outdoor fire pit than my old fire place tool set. The extra long length keeps me from getting burned when adjusting the logs after they shift. Hopefully they will last.
customer_reviews.author: TTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: ALL CLEANED UP, AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Works really well and is able to pick up and hold very large logs. I read a lot of reviews that talked about this item being very messy, a black residue, when unpacking and using for the first time, this has been corrected! I used caution when unpacking but there wasn't anything on my towel or my hands. Also the issue of it being stiff for the first uses has been corrected. I am very satisfied with this product and would encourage others to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: USMC wife&mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!  Heavy duty!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for bonfires as they are sturdy and strong and can handle large logs! Well made and durable and should last years! Long enough to keep away from the fire and the perfect addition to our outdoor firepit!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Love mine!
customer_reviews.text: I am finally able to use this thing at the campfire and I love it! It was a little stiff to start but after a couple uses it is just fine. I've moved everything from little tiny logs to some jumbos. Long live the campfire!
customer_reviews.author: LunkTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: These are good, not really easy to use. Came packaged kind of weird, but then again the items itself is odd shaped. Once we got them opened, they had a greasy film covering them. Believe this protects them for easy open, just be ware when opening and using them. You might get a little messy. They do have a long handle to prevent getting burned in the fire, they open easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Good Mid-weight fire tongs
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, very user friendly fire tongs. These are great to have around the fire if you like to grab and move and place and move and play with your fire to get it just right. I've been able to handle logs comfortably up to about 10 inches in diameter before I wanted something a bit stiffer, but that doesn't happen very often for me as I just have a small outdoor fire pit. I would definitely buy again and recommend to anyone who burns normal (6-8") logs. Anything bigger than that you may want to get a wrought iron set of tongs.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kettner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but Needed Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: These fire tongs are big and sturdy. A good size to be able to lift logs and sturdy enough to be safe. The tongs had two issues when they arrived. They were a little too stiff to easily use, a little WD-40 at the joints took care of that problem. And as some other reviews mentioned, they had a black coating that came off - getting hands, carpets, etc dirty. I used a hand cleaning product for grease removal bought at an auto parts store which cleaned the tongs well enough to keep. These were a good price, had they been more expensive, I would have been high annoyed by the issues requiring my attention.
customer_reviews.author: Expert Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty item
customer_reviews.text: We have used this only once, but love the sturdiness as compared to other tongs we've bought from Amazon over the years. They feel like they'll last us a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Somers

customer_reviews.title: At first,,,,,
customer_reviews.text: I thought I made mistake because out of the box they were veeery stiff and hard to use. But after reading the reviews realized all I had to do was oil the joints (duh!). Now they work perfectly with my fire pit. I highly recommend these very sturdy tweezers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail B. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: SOLID.  HEAVY.
customer_reviews.text: HEAVY. These are great. I've purchase several cheaper ones over the years for my outdoor fire pit. They always seem to fall apart after a season or two. No big deal because they were cheap to begin with. These are certainly not cheaply made. Spend the extra $10 and get a product like this. The first thing you will notice is how SOLID and HEAVY these are. Very well made. Much more than I was expecting. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: CincyAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Just what fireplace tongs should be
customer_reviews.text: These are great fireplace tongs. Pretty stiff to start out, but I put a little gun lube on the joints and exercised it for a while and now they are perfect. Can't wait to go camping again to have a chance to use them. Very sturdy tongs, no concern at all that they will bend like lesser tongs do. Recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: FrankW

customer_reviews.title: Very great at campfires when car camping
customer_reviews.text: These have been a huge hit while camping. Both adults and kids use them constantly at the campfire and they're durable enough that squirrely rough boys aren't able to break them (knock on wood)! Long enough to protect hands/arms from burning too. Not painfully heavy but definitely not a lightweight item that stores away compactly! So worth it though, for car camping.
customer_reviews.author: Pippy Longstockings

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have not used it in a firepit yet, but this looks well beyond what I was hoping for from a standpoint of a solid set of tongs. Can't wait to use them, but had to say how good they appear to be - the last set I had must have been 1/2 as thick of steel - good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Phil S.

customer_reviews.title: These are the ones!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking to replace my aging fireplace tongs for some time now but was hesitant to buy anything due to the poor reviews I found on Amazon. Well, my old tongs finally bit the dust so and I did one more search and found these. Trust me, these are the ones to get! They are very heavy duty and will lift the heaviest of logs without flexing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Picard

customer_reviews.title: A 'must have' if you're burning wood, fireplace or fire pit.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these a couple of years ago and they work great, the best I've ever found. We were at a party and the guy had some useless ...., so we sent them one of these. Now they think we know everything.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne G. Tuckett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a fire pit!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for something to use with our fire pit. When I came across these and read the reviews they seemed like exactly what I was looking for. These are quite a substantial and sturdy steel. Well made. Perfect for grabbing logs in a fire pit. They’re working great!! So happy to have found them.
customer_reviews.author: Chelerae

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty and Strong
customer_reviews.text: When I got these they had the black powder all over them like people have said and they were exteremly tight as well. But I would oil them and leave them outside in the weather and after a few weeks they are great. The size is good and the heavy duty materials are strong. I have found it very hard to find quality like this. So after I got past the manufacturing dirt and grime they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C. Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Made in America. Appears very durable. Gifted them to my husband to use when we have campfires during our camping trips. He seems very satisfied that they will be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than we thought!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our son in law. He has a fire pit burning almost year round. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Substantial Product
customer_reviews.text: We've gone through many sets of fireplace tongs. These are by far the heaviest, most durable ones yet. Beware, however, that as other reviewers said, you will need to wash them prior to using them as there is a slightly greasy black coating which will come off on anything it touches. I put them in the bathtub and coated them with Dawn dishwashing detergent, let them sit and then washed and dried them. They no longer leave any black marks.
customer_reviews.author: Glenwood Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy-duty log tweezers -- excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: When the title says "Heavy-Duty", it means it -- this is a serious tool. Absolutely outstanding quality and I fully expect it to physically outlast me. Would absolutely purchase again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Craig L.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Was a little more spendy than the usual Chinese junk, but absolutely worth it. I would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: PaddyThePig

customer_reviews.title: Great Control
customer_reviews.text: Got these to have more control on lifting/placing logs in the fire which it does perfectly. Missing one star as they are much heavier than I expected them to be but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Williams

customer_reviews.title: outdoor fire fan ?
customer_reviews.text: then this tool is indispensable...exactly the quality implement you want
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G Deana MD

customer_reviews.title: These work great. Yes
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Yes, there was some powder residue when I opened them, but knowing that from having read other reviews here gave me warning to open the box in the garage and not my living room...problem solved! These work great, and have made our campfire life so much easier. I wish I had these years ago...I have spent so many hours trying to push fiery logs with a stick. Now I don't have to!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: These are very durable. I read where people had issues with black coming off and getting all over hands, counters and clothes. Because I read that, I handled them carefully and was expecting that. I didn't notice it too much, but as a precaution, I thoroughly wiped them down with rubbing alcohol several times. They are a little stiff and might add a drop of gun oil at pivot points, but I don't want them too loose either. Overall I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: pepi

customer_reviews.title: Strong like bull
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and well built. I use it for my outdoor fire pit. Only problem is everyone wants to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Macey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Dad for camping. He is so excited about using them! They are very sturdy and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for campfires!
customer_reviews.text: Use these for our campfires. I am very happy with this product. I have used it to lift very large pieces of wood and it has worked great. Good heavy duty product and I’m sure this will last a long time. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Guesswho

customer_reviews.title: Great Fireplace Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Great for moving big logs and long enough to keep your hands cool even with a roaring fire. When they arrived the tweezers were very stiff and required some WD40 on all the hinges. The more I have used them the easier they become. A great addition to any fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Oasis Crew

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool. Makes using the fire pit a much safer and enjoyable experience.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: No Black Mess
customer_reviews.text: Because these are a Christmas gift, they have not been used, yet. However, other reviews talked about the "black stuff" that was a real mess when these were opened. There was NOTHING like that on these!! They are new in box, but when I handled them there was nothing residual on my hands or in the box. If I remember, I will review them further after using them for a while.
customer_reviews.author: G. Baggett

customer_reviews.title: a very good product and appears to be built well
customer_reviews.text: They do the job, as advertised, very well. I just was not expecting them to be so heavy. With enough strength, you can lift and move around very large pieces of fire wood. I just happen to be, a little, and older lady. Husband and grand-kids use with little to no effort. All in all, a very good product and appears to be built well, so they will last for years to come. I am pleased with them and recommend product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and long
customer_reviews.text: Nice and long, very sturdy and heavy duty. I didn't experience any excess coating on mine, they came out of the box clean and ready to use, even though from the reviews on here I was ready to clean them if need be. They really are the perfect fireplace tongs, just what I was looking for, especially after being disappointed in a cheap one I had purchased first. This is a case of getting what you pay for. These are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar pair of these I thought was pretty heavy duty until I got these. These are HEAVY DUTY. They aren't overly done but they will pick up most any chunk of wood in most bonfires or fire place. Yes, they did have a black coating that made a mess but I read that in the reviews and washed them as soon as I opened the package. I did not have any trouble after that. Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty and weel-made
customer_reviews.text: Have not actually used yet in fire situation, but they are very strongly built of substantially thick metal and seem well made. They did have some sort of black coating which I mostly removed by soaking in the bathtub with dish detergent and hot rinsing. Some stronger degreaser might have worked better - like maybe brake cleaner or carburetor cleaner..
customer_reviews.author: B.M. Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty! They work well and I normally have to use both hands for larger logs but that's OK. When you get these, WIPE THEM OFF WITH SOME SOLVENT OR SOMETHING! The stuff on them will stain your hands and clothes. I sprayed the handles fluorescent orange so they are easy to see when hanging on the shed door in the firelight.
customer_reviews.author: PipeFighter

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love these for the campfires. Worked wonderfully. Sold them with our trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Aubert

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: these work great for my fire pit! Did have to oil them up at the hinges but what do you expect for something like this. Unlike the other reviews I didn't have any black stuff come off onto my hands and they wernt oily either out of the box
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best wood pinchers on the market fantastic awesome and I've owned a lot of them
customer_reviews.author: mark benschoter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality product
customer_reviews.text: These are solid, sturdy, and work well. Well-made. I did spray a bit of lubricant on the joints so that they weren't so stiff, but otherwise they are a good addition for camping and the patio firepit.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tool and was surprised with how hard it was to use. The joint was very stiff. Also, upon opening and touching it my hands were covered in black soot. I am not clear on why it was filthy dirty (the manufacturing process or if it was previously used?) but I've had to wash the tool and that too made quite a mess.
customer_reviews.author: PLee

customer_reviews.title: this fire adjuster performed great. My nephews even used it to carry the ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered after reading many reviews about many different products. I just spent 3 days camping with family. Whether it was me as an adult or my 10 year old nephews or nieces, this fire adjuster performed great. My nephews even used it to carry the new logs over to the fire to burn. Our fire never went out for 3 days with the help of this fire poker.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Good product, no black residue.
customer_reviews.text: Many reviews states that the product would come with a black residue that would come off on hands and clothing when opening the package. However, the company must have read the reviews! Our tongs came with no greasy residue or black that came off in our hands. This is the perfect product for our outside fireplace. Glad we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: sg1961

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: These work great with my Solo stove! Sturdy and reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These tongs work great. The company must have read some of the ...
customer_reviews.text: These tongs work great. The company must have read some of the other reviews about the oil / black paint residue though, because when mine came there was very little of this problem. Also as stated a little hard to work at first but they did break in just fine. Pay the extra and get these you will not be disappointed ! ROCK ON
customer_reviews.author: MDW

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I struggle using these clamps. It's VERY stiff to open and close and the metal is very heavy. So, moving around logs is like a workout. I end up using the poker most of the time and this thing is collecting dust. It is, however, sturdy and pretty solid. If I had stronger arms, I'd probably give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: F. K.

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: They are very stiff when new.I used WD40 on all the joints & work them back & forth & now they work perfect..
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Work well. Replacement for a previous identical set that i lost/left at a campground 😟. Would definitely purchase again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: ... fire pit in the back yard and it works great especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: We use the heavy duty log tweezers for camping and for our fire pit in the back yard and it works great especially for the price. Some pieces of our fire wood was pretty heavy and it still did the job. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty and CLEAN finish
customer_reviews.text: I read the issues with the black residue so I contacted the seller directly. He said they have corrected the problem. I received mine today. It is very well made, very heavy duty, NO black residue, really nice CLEAN smooth black satin powder coat finish and smooth hinge operation.
customer_reviews.author: Kudzukiller

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new log lifter for camping. It's hard to buy these singly. You usually have to buy as a set so it was nice to find this selling separately. Will get a lot of use from it. It's very sturdy and can lift some pretty heavy lots.
customer_reviews.author: chood

customer_reviews.title: Xlnt firewood tongs
customer_reviews.text: I like them so much I bought two-one for home and one for rv. They are definitely heavy duty and provide you with the safety of moving logs on a fire. Some posters mentioned a black residue on the tongs (probably from manufacturing process). Use a solvent to clean them up...such as paint thinner, mineral spirits, goo off, etc. Well worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought one years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Work perfect and quality built! Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Clay B

customer_reviews.title: these make fires fun to play with again
customer_reviews.text: After ears of using regular fire rings and pokers, these make fires fun to play with again. Pick up and move wood around exactly where you want it in your fire pit. I wish I had one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G. Omaha

customer_reviews.title: Solid Piece!
customer_reviews.text: We needed something that was durable for use in our outdoor fire pit. This works GREAT and I can tell it's going to last a long time. It stays outside (in a protected area) and it's been out there for over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki C.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy! He can't wait to have a campfire party ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a gift for my husband of 35 years. He had been using a tool he put together but the logs were always slipping off of it. This certainly does the trick. Very sturdy! He can't wait to have a campfire party to show it off!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A Lyons

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my neighbor fir the outside fires ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my neighbor fir the outside fires we have in summer. He really likes it because it's substantial and has a longer reach than some others.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Will not camp without it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to maintain your campfire safely. Before I struggled to move logs around to maintain the fire or help it to burn out at the end of the evening by using the bottom of my foot or sticks laying around in the campsite. I will never camp without it.
customer_reviews.author: DrSheila

customer_reviews.title: They're plenty strong enough for typical firewood used in a ...
customer_reviews.text: They're plenty strong enough for typical firewood used in a residential fireplace. Not for tree trunks in an outdoor bonfire.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Strong pair of tweezers
customer_reviews.text: These tweezers/tongs are solid. Almost too solid as they are a little tight. They require you to use 2 hands to squeeze and are longer than most really need at about 2 feet. they would be great if you had a very large campfire though. I bought them since I know they won't bend like others.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fire tongs.
customer_reviews.text: We had a difficult time finding log turners locally and ordered these unsure of the quality. These are by far the heaviest and sturdiest we have ever seen. They should serve us well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tongs
customer_reviews.text: The tongs were a little tight, so I added some oil to all of the joints and now they open and close pretty easily. They seem pretty heavy duty. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a firepit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, exactly what I needed for my new firepit. Highly recommended. The only watch out that was not an issue for me is that it came with a lot of black dust that I believe is form the manufacturing process and I had to clean it thoroughly before start using it. Other than that it's the perfect tool to move the logs when doing a bonfire
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele Tedoldi

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty is right!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent heavy duty log tweezer. Does an outstanding job moving or turning heavy logs. Length is sufficient to maintain safe comfortable distance from fire while using device. Construction is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Knaveheartt

customer_reviews.title: This the pair you want to buy!! Look no further
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these for two years at camp now and this is the pair to buy on Amazon!! Best purchase for a campfire. Strong and not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Janek

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tongs.  Won't Flex like cheaper ones
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tongs. More expensive but you get what you pay for. These will pick up logs without flexing or bending. Very well made and exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Syracuse Pete

customer_reviews.title: they are great.
customer_reviews.text: These work well. I received many compliments about thesetting at the campground. They could be a little longer, but other than that, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I asked them about it and they recommended we get one
customer_reviews.text: A few years ago we sent one to friends who bought a place "up north"! When we got our own fire pit, I asked them about it and they recommended we get one. We're BOTH happy with it. It's NOT a flimsy tool and is capable of handling logs that are quite large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have a fire pit in my backyard and needed something to move the logs around. Have used these multiple times and they work great! I know some people complained about the soot on them but come on, clean them up really fast and no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Quarts

customer_reviews.title: Product is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very solid build. They remind me of the ones we had growing up (I'm 42). They are heavy gauge steel as advertised. They are stiff to open and close which is what I would expect from a new set proving their ruggedness. Other reviewers commented on a "film" or "grease" on the tweezers upon opening the package. In my case there was no residue. The tweezers are clean. I highly recommend these. Looking forward to trying them out this weekend
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Kosarko

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product-was looking forward tings to help adjust logs in my outdoor fire pit-works perfect! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Bowar

customer_reviews.title: We are going to love these Log Tweezers
customer_reviews.text: When they came I had done my homework reading reviews so knew that we had to clean them good before handling. My husband is anxious to use them but the parks here don't open till May 1. May add to this later if that's possible.
customer_reviews.author: Cabincreek

customer_reviews.title: Not wimpy
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and heavy duty. We use them to move logs around in the campfire. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Nice large and powerful Log thongs
customer_reviews.text: This worked great and was exactly what I was looking for. The only issue I had was it was cover in some kind of soot that I had to wash off but I assumed it was something for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mannino

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty! Made in China, but well made. Paint does not rub off, feels like powder coated. Hinges needed no lube.
customer_reviews.author: tjalmy

customer_reviews.title: these are awkward to handle and when they came I ...
customer_reviews.text: these are awkward to handle and when they came I could hardly move them. Had to oil them up and often to get them to break away and its still difficult to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: CycloneVette

customer_reviews.title: Good value log tool
customer_reviews.text: My son is using this with his firepit and he loves it! Good quality and I believe it will last for many seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Like it..not in love with it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my boyfriend and he liked it. The paint though rubbed off so he ended up repainting it with something that would last a little longer. Other than that it does what it's meant to do.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiiansun

customer_reviews.title: If you leave it outside (we have an outdoor firepit) ...
customer_reviews.text: If you leave it outside (we have an outdoor firepit), it rusts. If you want to leave this outside, look elsewhere. Otherwise, it does what it is intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: Roman K

customer_reviews.title: Fun new toy
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves this for building fires both in and outdoors. It really is the only tool you need. Only trouble he has now is that everybody wants their turn with his new toy!
customer_reviews.author: roozoomom

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Only problem that I experienced with these is upon arrival, I was using them and looked at my hands. Holy cow they we're completely black. Needed to wipe the tongs down with soap and water for a bit to get the machining process off.
customer_reviews.author: D and T

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my hubby. He just can't leave the logs alone while we enjoy the fire pit. This tool makes it easy for him to arrange the logs and no more burnt knuckles!
customer_reviews.author: jamie1972

customer_reviews.title: First class tongs.
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid tongs. No wiggle, smooth action, extremely strong. At the tip, the ends do touch, so you can grab small twigs as well as logs.
customer_reviews.author: mtns6666

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This product is heavy duty. Will handle various size logs. I've had some cheaper models but they eventually bend or break. Would recommend this product to anyone that needs log tongs.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Maglovsky

customer_reviews.title: The campfire tongs are perfect! Now we can retrieve the hot logs when ...
customer_reviews.text: The campfire tongs are perfect ! Now we can retrieve the hot logs when they fall from the fire .
customer_reviews.author: John Raver

customer_reviews.title: Great for our fire pit
customer_reviews.text: As described, it is heavy duty. Great for our fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Zoo Lady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool for controlling wood in your fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect tool for managing everything from small pieces of hot coal to large logs in your fireplace. Glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: hondast1100

customer_reviews.title: Awesome firepit tool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband's birthday and they're perfect! Also very heavy duty and mine did not have the black stuff on them that other reviews mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: Yeah these are as bad arse as everyone says
customer_reviews.text: Yeah these are as bad arse as everyone says. Great replacement for the flimsy ones that come in most kits. It will turn the heaviest of logs...
customer_reviews.author: MountainRat03

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: I give it 3 stars since it would be great for an outdoor firepit. I bought this for our indoor fireplace and it's too heavy, too big and leaves black marks on your hands. We won't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Dazylyn

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any outdoor fire or fire-pit
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have for any outdoor fire or fire-pit. Made well, only they should have been zinc coated to prevent rust.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Good feel
customer_reviews.text: All seems well, just like our old ones. Have had a chance to actually use, they are for the summer fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gray

customer_reviews.title: Seems constructed very well. Haven't had to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems constructed very well. Haven't had to use it yet so unable to comment on how well it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Buy
customer_reviews.text: they stopped selling this style in all stores in my metro area of ST Paul, mn. Much more solid then the others i have and longer too. I checked for the black grease? people were commenting on (right out of the box) and was all clean.
customer_reviews.author: mark p.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are long, strong, and super useful fireplace tongs. A lot of the others sounded flimsy and like they couldn't handle a big log. These are great and were an amazing price. My friends are jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

product_meta.title: The Perfect CampfireGrill Heavy-Duty Log Tweezers
product_meta.description: The log Tweezers Scissor, action allow you to grab a hot log, very handy when trying to place a hot log in just the right place.
feature_bullets: Steel log grabber for camp fires
Scissor action allows you to grab and maneuver hot burning logs
Also makes a great accessory for your fireplace
Extra heavy duty, new clean powder coat surface.
